name: Sketchy - Drawing Made Fun
description:
I made this program as a noob teenager. Found it in old backups.

I had fun using it, so I thought I'd share it!

• How to use:

You can select different brushes using the keyboard. The brushes are spread across the 0-9 number keys, Q-P alphabet keys (first row) and A & S.

Animated ones started from 9.

The .exe is safe, scanned with Windows Defender and Malwarebytes.
